ChallengeDef.label: Reach 10 Colonists

ChallengeDef.label: Reach 20 Colonists
ChallengeDef.description: Have 20 colonists at the same time. Can you manage this to happen?

ChallengeDef.label: Reach 50 Colonists
ChallengeDef.description: Have 20 colonists at the same time. Is it possible at all?

ChallengeDef.label: Kill 100 Animals
ChallengeDef.description: You need some fresh meat to feed your growing colony. It's easy to get it from wildlife around.

ChallengeDef.label: Kill 500 Animals
ChallengeDef.description: Roll up your sleeves, theres a lot of shooting practice expected!

ChallengeDef.label: Kill 1000 Animals
ChallengeDef.description: Actually, you can make a lot of apparel from all this skin!

ChallengeDef.description: Just clean up the map from all animals. That's enough of them eating your crops, getting mad and attacking colonists. And don't forget your pets, 'cause I have allergy.

ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out 100 Tiles

ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out All Resources
ChallengeDef.description: Mine out all of resources hidden in rocks on the map
ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out All
ChallengeDef.description: Don't leave a single mineable rock tile!
ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

ChallengeDef.description: Teach one of your colonists to be a legendary master (level 20) in some skill

ChallengeDef.label: Outshine Michelangelo
ChallengeDef.description: Build a legendary masterpiece sculpture, the one of unpreceded beauty and market value.
